title: Black screen loading screen causing a false leave
body: I joined a game and my screen was black and had to close. I believe I lost LP aswell. I will be creating a ticket to get that back. Multiple reports of the same issue in the bug section. What is going on?

replies.body:
If this is happening in the Beta Client, then this is a known issue that can occur while transitioning into champion select. Current workarounds that are being tested are to either collapse your friends list before queueing for a match or use the *Legacy Client* (from login) for now:

(Click to enlarge)
https://imgur.com/a/GJulP

Let me know if either worked for you.
I will just use the old client. You still aren't addressing any lost LP that occurred on my account and also I'm sure if I left again it would be a bigger consequence because I had left in the past.

If you had experienced this in more than a single match, then yes, it's possible that the queue dodge timer would grow if you had continued to attempt joining matches back to back with the same issue.

As for your LP loss, we're unable to make any modifications to your LP after a change has been recorded by the servers. It's unfortunate that you experienced this issue during a ranked queue, but you'll be able to avoid this from here out.

I hope that cleared up the confusion.

It did not, as you should be accommodating your customers who are at fault for a problem that isn't their fault. It takes a lot of time to get points, to lose them over a glitch and getting no assistance in retrieving them back where they should be, or any other  account reimbursement or help, makes it very frustrating.
